exam.question: Those gifts of rare books that were given to us were deeply _______.

answer.explain: 句意： 那些作为礼物送给我们的珍贵图书深受重视。approve： 赞成， 同意， 批准； appeal： 诉诸； apply： 申请； 应用。

sentences.sContent: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.sCn: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.sContent: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.sCn: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.sContent: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.sCn: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.sContent: ...In order to appreciate the magnificence of this great mountain...
...Not only can they appreciate the wonderful landscape of Harbin but also taste authentic northeast food...
...I really appreciate what you’ve been through today...
...We write to preserve our family histories so our children and grandchildren can learn and appreciate their heritage...

remMethod.val: ap(表加强) ＋ preci(价值) ＋ ate → 肯定价值 → 赏识

words.tran: 感激的；赏识的；有欣赏力的；承认有价值的

trans.tranCn: 重视， 赏识； 领会， 体会； 感谢； 增值
trans.tranOther: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done
